meanings.sent1: My homies always have my back when I need them.
meanings.sent2: I love hanging out with my homies on the weekends.
meanings.sent3: My homies and I are like peas in a pod, always together.
meanings.sent4: Even though we argue sometimes, my homies are the pillars of my life.
meanings.sent5: The bond between me and my homies is unbreakable.

meanings.definition: Members of the same social group or gang.
meanings.sent1: The homies in our neighborhood stick together through thick and thin.
meanings.sent2: The gang leader called for a meeting with all the homies.
meanings.sent3: The homies decided to throw a party to celebrate their unity.
meanings.sent4: The homies' loyalty to each other is unmatched in the city.
meanings.sent5: The homies' presence in the community is strong and respected.

meanings.definition: Used informally to refer to a group of friends or acquaintances.
meanings.sent1: Hey, homies, let's grab some pizza after school!
meanings.sent2: I bumped into my homies at the mall yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The homies planned a surprise birthday party for their friend.
meanings.sent4: My homies are always up for a spontaneous adventure.
meanings.sent5: The bond between these homies is evident in their laughter and smiles.
